duties_responsibilities.duty: Attend every prospect and client meeting with your Lead Advisor
Take notes during the meeting to document key updates and planning points
Draft follow-up emails to send to clients and schedule follow-up tasks for advisors and clients to ensure everything is completed
Work with the Lead Advisor to prepare for meetings and to do financial planning work between meetings
Create financial plans using Right Capital and draft recommendations for the Lead Advisor to review
Attend weekly team meetings and one-on-one meetings with the Lead Advisor
Attend Root’s Advisor Office Hours to grow as an advisor continually

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
